GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v5.10.112
GSD.description:
ARM: davinci: da850-evm: Avoid NULL pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.112 by commit 0a312ec66a03133d28570f07bc52749ccfef54da, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit bae105879f2f2404155da6f50b3636193d228a62. For more details please see the references link.
